//: This graffiti is generally assumed to come from before the Cataclysm but post dino

text.text: Rejoice.  The great eaters have returned
There is a detailed drawing of a predator dinosaur with an arrow pointing at the mouth and the note 'INSERT HERE'.
Learn to fly!  Mess with a big dino!
I give up, I'm joining the dinosaurs
This is a cartoon rendition of a long necked four legged dinosaur.
This is a crudely spray painted tag adorned with dinosaur skulls.
Don't believe the government, the dinosaurs are real!
